description: Node is a worker node in Kubernetes. Each node will have a unique identifier in the cache (i.e. in etcd).

apiVersion.description: The version of the schema for the object representation

kind.description: A string value representing the REST resource

metadata.description: Standard object metadata. The name of a Node must be a valid DNS subdomain name.

spec.description: Spec defines the behavior of a node.

status.description: Most recently observed status of the node.
